8435.title: Primal Survivor
8435.description: Join survival instructor Hazen Audel as he tackles some of mankind’s most rigorous journeys, relying on skills learned from native inhabitants.

9693.title: Vihari
9693.description: Vihari is a Telugu reality show on Maa TV. It is a travel-based show that covers various tourist locations across India and abroad.

1260005171.title: Cannes Connection
1260005171.description: From exclusive celeb interviews to sizzling red carpet looks, Anupama Chopra gives a complete rundown of Cannes Film Festival directly from the French Riviera.

1260006710.title: Egypt with World's Greatest Explorer
1260006710.description: Sir Ranulph Fiennes celebrates the 50th anniversary of his iconic 1968 expedition of River Nile with his famous cousin, actor Joseph Fiennes.

1260058623.title: Earth Moods
1260058623.description: Escape everyday life with Earth Moods. Viewers relax and reset as they travel to blue glaciers, swirling dunes, bustling cities and lush rainforests.

1260109696.title: Songs of the River
1260109696.description: Music composer Shantanu Moitra journeys across the river Ganges, capturing indelible sights and spectrums of sound to render an epic music album.

1260122141.title: Dum Laga Ke India
1260122141.description: Savour the taste of tradition! Ranveer Brar journeys across vibrant cities, uncovering the indelible history and unheard stories of culinary culture in India.

1260127328.title: Postcards from Maharashtra
1260127328.description: A travel documentary exploring the beauty of Maharashtra. The host travels all across the state, experiencing different cuisines, history and spiritualism.

1260131138.title: One for the Road
1260131138.description: An ensemble of Tastemade’s most adventurous travelers take on the world in this solo travel series.

1260131773.title: Origins
1260131773.description: Erwan Heussaff explores some of the lesser-known islands in the Philippines, meeting the people and getting a rare glimpse into their unique traditions.
